name: Fighties
description: Fighties is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. Choose from a wide selection of Fighties each with their own unique play style. Beat down your opponents to become the strongest Fightie of them all.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1.2 GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 25 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fighties appears to be the first game developed by PillowPigGames. What a solid first development.  Let me start by saying the screenshots dont do it justice. The graphics, once in a game, are surprisingly smooth and polished.  Character design is excellent. Each character has wholly unique abilities and play style, which is an achievement rarely reached with such a large cast of characters. This is the major selling point for me. Each character you unlock will have genuinely unique skillsets/stats that will require a completely different strategy in game.  Many recent 2-D platform based competitive arena games dont add many new concepts, this is not the case with fighties. Combat is original and thoughtful, and they have not fallen into the trap of lazilly knocking off the abilities of other characters to complete their lineup.  The price, when compared to similar games, is incredibly generous considering the content. Honestly this game blows away other games with the same price. The price could be doubled, or possibly even trippled and still be reasonable.

Its a great fun fighting game to meele with friends.  So, maybe there is no real online gameplay (since no people seem to be online anymore) but local 4 player is great and IMO is better than Towerfall Ascension since there is great variability in the characters  And single player arcade is a challenge, you got easy, normal and hard, the difference? You face more enemies and more bosses (from 1 on easy to 3 on hard) as difficulty increases, also previous bosses HP increase, and let me tell you, both arcade modes (there is two version, each with their own 3 bosses) are HARD, depending on the character you are facing the boss it might be nearly impossible.  The hard boss on arcade 2 is a complete nut buster, The challenge is quite on par with most AAA figthing games and you will need to master all the movements mechanics and skills of your character to succeed.  There is one complain about this game, some characters are clearly stronger and easier to use and others frustratingly hard to use or have a not-so-useful skill. Specially on arcade or survival you will notice how some characters are too frustrating to use compared to others that do insta-kills or have better range.  Overall a great fighting experience with a lot of content
One of the boss battles pits you against a character with puppets... It's like wrestling an autistic 5 year old lubed in olive oil.

This game was amazing for it's price honestly. This is a brawler platformer with some creativty behind the combat and the characters. The game isn't difficult to get a basic understanding of and it's a great game to play with friends I had no issues with the game other than 2 major things. First I had issues with it's netcode the online multiplayer seems to bug out response time with friends. Secondly the game's Bosses tended to feel boring as it was rinse and repeat with the combat. Other than those two factors this game is a solid pick up and easy to fall in love with i'd give this game a 9/10.

This is a fantastic game! I highly recommend it to anybody who likes fighting games! The price of this game is EXTREMELY reasonable and I was suprised when it was only 5$! Thanks to the developers for the cute and fun experience! !

Great game. Fast paced and hectic, with enough content to back it up and keep things fresh. Some fighters are absoultely hilarious (The puppet guy) and others require a lot of precision. With everyone fighting like hyper-active squirrels on crack, this game is sure to keep you busy and is well worth the pricetag.

Really good game! Full of a very broad set of characters and abilities, that make this game special.  Although:  - You really need to get rid of/nerf the mime guy, he's extremely over powered. - The controls screen got annoying when i edit one control, i have to edit the rest of the controls. Also you can't edit the back button (c). - I don't know how your supposed to figure out the bubble girls ability. - Try to balance out the abilities - Maybe make it so special abilities don't instantly kill a character but take a large amount of health off.  Overall this game has huge potential, you could even add a adventure part of the game (much like Castle Crashers). I can't wait to see what this game got for the future :)
sick casual game to play with mates Boss fights will take time though and be more annoying than being stuck behind an elderly driver
This is an amazing fighting game that I thoroughly enjoy. That's coming from a person who dislikes most fighting games..  Not to mention this game is only 5 dollars.

Along with Eskimo dude. Seriously. Change that ♥♥♥♥
I like it. Nice controls, unique charcters, and challenging ai. 10/10 would buy again.

Unexpectedly got a real kick for my $5!  Solid fighting game with a very fun local and online co-op but most importantly a fun singleplayer!  The game offers quite a variety of characters to play as, each with their own play style 'speed,range,close combat, specials...etc (some are great for arcade mode while others are better for multiplayer).  Most all of the characters can be unlocked in 'the crane game'  (it would be nice to have other ways of obtaining them 'eg. play 25 battles/ or/ beat the game with 3 characters on any mode'  The items in game at the moment feel a bit bland as most of them are basicly buffs rather than items (item wise it boils down to 2 real items a shield and a 1UP. would love to see some work here)  There is a nifty level creator, very simple to use and great for those that love to make their own arenas to challenge their friends in  As 'fisher-price' as it gets in terms of controls  If you enjoy a fun lil brawler with hours and hours of challenging and replayable goodness, add this wonderful game to your collection for $5
8/10 nerf the damn ninja boss
Art style is very cute, gameplay is simple for pick up and play and also good for a little competitive play all for just 5$. If you like fighting games, you'll probably enjoy this game
I say this game is MAGNIFICIENT! <3  Easy to get into but hard to master. Simple enough for anyone to join and enjoy. I can't name one flaw in this game if I looked hard enough.

This is an adorable fighting game in the Super Smash Bros realm. There are quite a bit of different characters, and none of the ones I've unlocked so far are copies of another, they're all original. For the most part all the fighters are evenly balanced, with only one or two marginally stronger than another. From what I can tell, the devs of this game are still up-and-at'em, so I'm sure this will get fixed very soon. Whether you're fighting against A.I. to unlock the next character or beating up your friends, you're sure to get enjoyment out of this game. Plus, it's only $4.99! Where can you go wrong with that?

Fighties is a fun little game to have, sort of like Mega man meets Smash with unique little 8-bit characters battling it out in closed areas with power-ups. This game is quiet enjoyable especially with friends with fast and slick controls and fun gameplay. But I have a few problems with the game, first of all the music is quiet terrible, the music sounds like something out of the NES bootlegs you could buy in China, I myself found that the music can be changed by replacing the .ogg files in the files, I changed it to the Scott Pilgrim OST which I think fits more, my second problem is the items, they have your basic buffs such as speed, power, health and debuffs also, but the way they are presented are a little confusing, they have the textures of stuffed animals that change colour, I don't know if the other colour varients have something different about them but I havent been able to figure it out, Its difficult to understand what item does what without playing before such as Giraffe = 1UP? Sometimes I ran into the items getting debufs on my speed making some fights impossible to do (Especially the boss fights) My Final problem was the over balance and under balance of certain characters, some characters feel way too strong such as the Mime character that can spawn a copy of himself that throws cards that insta-kill and this is quiet tricky to counter, and other characters such as the one who can climb walls feels to weak to do anything. I think this game has some good potential and is well worth a look, its a really good game for £3.99 and these where my only concerns that I thought should be addressed.

I can imagine this being more fun on a consloe that on my Mac. I find the whole control system a bit confusing for a game that looks fun and simple. Maybe it's just me being awful at games but for the price, I can't argue with it too much.
Love the art style and the concept. Don't like the one hit kill and think the speed is a little to fast. It's more button mash less strategy.

PS. A friend owned the game so shared library is nice :) The art style of Fighties was great but the game feels really underdeveloped. Playing by yourself is also a major flaw as when you play arcade mode or survival mode you can easily get killed immediately and once you respawn.  Arcade mode is often unfair as from what I mentioned earlier also has you fight two of the CPU at once and they can range from really easy or unfair. The bosses are also difficult as most other characters as you will get killed immediately and results you restarting from the beginning  As for character variety you can only get new ones by beating the bosses in arcade mode which are really underpowered compared to fighting them as a boss and the crane game which is pretty annoying to find  Overall dont play this game if you want to have an easy time playing the game

this game blows buy Duck Game instead. everything that makes Duck Game amazing, the controls, the music, the level design, fun factor, online multi player, fast paced fast loading action is all missing here. instead you get booooooooring music and sound, boring plain level design, unbalanced characters, slow loading just to restart a match, and the laggiest online matches ever..   just go buy Duck Game and have fun playing a well made suprisingly deep game instead of this mess.

Befor I would recommend this game to anyone it would have to be rebalenced, the online gameing fixed, and the controls to be more keybord friendly. Other than that most of the other problems for me is just perefrence.
